QuickConnectType.description: The type of quick connect. In the Amazon Connect console, when you create a quick connect, you are prompted to assign one of the following types: Agent (USER), External (PHONE_NUMBER), or Queue (QUEUE).
QuickConnectType.markdownDescription:
The type of quick connect. In the Amazon Connect console, when you create a quick connect, you are prompted to assign one of the following types: Agent (USER), External (PHONE_NUMBER), or Queue (QUEUE).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PHONE_NUMBER | QUEUE | USER  
Update requires: No interruption

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number in E.164 format.
PhoneNumber.markdownDescription:
The phone number in E.164 format.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\+[1-9]\d{1,14}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ContactFlowArn.description: The identifier of the contact flow.
ContactFlowArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the contact flow.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/contact-flow/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

QueueArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier for the queue.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/queue/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

UserArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the user.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*/agent/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

PhoneNumberQuickConnectConfig.description: The phone configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is PHONE_NUMBER.
PhoneNumberQuickConnectConfig.markdownDescription:
The phone configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is PHONE_NUMBER.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

QueueQuickConnectConfig.description: The queue configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is QUEUE.
QueueQuickConnectConfig.markdownDescription:
The queue configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is QUEUE.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

UserQuickConnectConfig.description: The user configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is USER.
UserQuickConnectConfig.markdownDescription:
The user configuration. This is required only if QuickConnectType is USER.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

QuickConnectConfig.description: Configuration settings for the quick connect.
QuickConnectConfig.markdownDescription:
Configuration settings for the quick connect.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is maximum of 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

QuickConnectArn.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Type: String
